collection.title: Food & Wine with Bangkok
collection.description:
Discover the flavors of Bangkok on this immersive Food & Wine journey!
Join us from May 3 to May 18, 2025, as we explore the vibrant culinary scene of Thailand's capital. This tour blends local traditions with modern flair — from bustling street food markets to elegant wine-paired dinners. Expect a curated mix of guided tastings, cultural excursions, and unforgettable meals.

Tour Highlights:

Sample authentic Thai dishes and regional delicacies

Explore Bangkok’s best food markets and hidden culinary gems

Enjoy exclusive wine-pairing sessions with local sommeliers

Travel hassle-free with airport transfers and expert local guides

Meeting point: KLIA 1 (Malaysia), with coordinates provided for easy navigation

Whether you're a foodie, a wine enthusiast, or simply curious, this experience is crafted to indulge your senses and immerse you in Thai culture — all in comfort and style.
